title: Samosa
procedure: Prepare dough with flour, oil, and water.
Make filling with potatoes, peas, and spices.
Roll dough into small circles and cut in half.
Fold into a cone, fill with mixture, and seal edges.
Deep fry until golden and crisp.

title: Nachos
procedure: Spread tortilla chips on a baking tray.
Top with cheese, jalapeños, and beans.
Serve hot with salsa and guacamole.

title: Spring Rolls
procedure: Prepare filling with cabbage, carrots, and soy sauce.
Place filling on spring roll wrapper and roll tightly.
Seal edges with water or flour paste.
Deep fry until golden and crispy.
